name: Don't step into the darkness
description:
Don't step into the darkness

Help little boy who is afraid of darkness to turn lights in every room of his house, without stepping into the darkness, so he could prove to his parents that he is old enough to get a computer.

Turn all the lights off, ending up in the specified final room.

A game made for Mini Ludum Dare #68 themed Childhood memories.

We are all newbies, and this is our first attempt to finish a game.
